protocol_name: QIAGEN Allprep mini RNA extraction with QIAGEN RNase-Free DNase Set.
protocol_name_html: QIAGEN Allprep mini RNA extraction with QIAGEN RNase-Free DNase Set.
description: Validated with : rodent liver, kidney, eye, skeletal muscles, adrenal gland.
before_start:
1. Prepare the lysis buffer on the day of the extraction by adding 1% of beta-mercaptoethanol to the total needed RLT volume.
  2. Use 1000ul of RLT+1% β-ME per sample if starting with the suggested amount of 20+/-5mg of tissue (Muscles<20mg, all other tissues </=30mg) 
  3. Confirm that ethanol was added to buffer RPE, AW1, AW2
  4. Prepare the DNase right before the digestion step. 
  5. Prepare 2 buckets of wet ice : for RNA samples post trap-on-column step and for tissue lysate and DNA samples.

materials.reagent_name: Ethyl alcohol, Pure 200 proof, for molecular biology

warning: • When working with QIAGEN column extraction kits, avoid using bleach.
guidelines:
1. Make sure to seperate RNA and DNA work
  2. Work quickly and efficiantly to preved RNA degradation
  3. Make sure to not thaw the tissues at the time of weighting, work on dry ice. 
  4. Stopping point at DNase digestion step
  5. At the time of the homogenization, keep the samples on wet ice
status_info: We use this protocol in our group and it is working

components.data: Homogenize the sample in up to 1ml of RLT buffer(+β-ME) using Polytron large probe at 20K rpm, make sure to break every 15 seconds to allow the probe to cool off . For non muscle tissue - 2 repeats, for muscles - 3 homogenization rounds or untill homogenious. Take care to avoid foaming.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Homogenize the sample in up to 1ml of RLT buffer(+β-ME) using Polytron large probe at 20K rpm, make sure to break every 15 seconds to allow the probe to cool off . For non muscle tissue - 2 repeats, for muscles - 3 homogenization rounds or untill homogenious. Take care to avoid foaming.

components.data: Centrifuge the lysate for 3 minutes at full speed (RT). Transfer up to 600ul of the supernatant, avoiding the pelleted cell debris in to an Allprep DNA mini spin column.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Centrifuge the lysate for 3 minutes at full speed (RT). Transfer up to 600ul of the supernatant, avoiding the pelleted cell debris in to an Allprep DNA mini spin column.

components.data: Centrifuge DNA spin column for 30 sec at 10,000 rpm
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Centrifuge DNA spin column for 30 sec at 10,000 rpm

components.data: Repeat untill all supernatant passed the DNA column.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Repeat untill all supernatant passed the DNA column.

source_data.thread_title: Comment on step 4 of QIAGEN Allprep mini RNA extraction with QIAGEN RNase-Free DNase Set.
source_data.protocol_name: QIAGEN Allprep mini RNA extraction with QIAGEN RNase-Free DNase Set.
source_data.protocol_name_html: QIAGEN Allprep mini RNA extraction with QIAGEN RNase-Free DNase Set.
source_data.annotation: Make sure to keep the flow through that contains RNA.
source_data.thread_text: Make sure to keep the flow through that contains RNA.
source_data.body: Make sure to keep the flow through that contains RNA.

components.data: Place the Allprep DNA spin column in a new 2ml collection tube (supplied). And store at 4°C for later DNA purification. Use the flow through for RNA purification below.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Place the Allprep DNA spin column in a new 2ml collection tube (supplied). And store at 4°C for later DNA purification. Use the flow through for RNA purification below.

components.data: Add 713 μl of 100% ethanol to the flow through, (adjust based on starting RTL volume). Mix well by pipetting or vortexing all of the tubes at once.  Proceed immediately to step 5. Adjust volume of ethanol based on the starting volume of RLT buffer.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 713 μl of 100% ethanol to the flow through, (adjust based on starting RTL volume). Mix well by pipetting or vortexing all of the tubes at once.  Proceed immediately to step 5. Adjust volume of ethanol based on the starting volume of RLT buffer.

components.data: Transfer up to 600 μl sample to the RNeasy mini spin column. Centrifuge for 15 sec at 10,000 rpm. Discard the flow-through. Repeat step 5 until all the lysate+ethanol had passed through the column.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Transfer up to 600 μl sample to the RNeasy mini spin column. Centrifuge for 15 sec at 10,000 rpm. Discard the flow-through. Repeat step 5 until all the lysate+ethanol had passed through the column.

components.data: Add 350 μl Buffer RW1 to the RNeasy spin column, and centrifuge for 15 sec at 10,000 rpm to wash the spin column membrane. Discard the flow-through.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 350 μl Buffer RW1 to the RNeasy spin column, and centrifuge for 15 sec at 10,000 rpm to wash the spin column membrane. Discard the flow-through.

components.data: Prepare the DNase master mix by combining 10ul DNase with 70ul RDD buffer per each sample.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Prepare the DNase master mix by combining 10ul DNase with 70ul RDD buffer per each sample.

components.data: Add 80 μl of DNase master mix to each RNeasy spin column membrane, and incubate on the bench top for at least 30 min. (No longer than 1 hour)
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 80 μl of DNase master mix to each RNeasy spin column membrane, and incubate on the bench top for at least 30 min. (No longer than 1 hour)

components.data: Add 350 μl Buffer RW1 to the RNeasy spin column, and centrifuge for 15 sec at10,000 rpm to wash the spin column membrane. Discard the flow-through.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 350 μl Buffer RW1 to the RNeasy spin column, and centrifuge for 15 sec at10,000 rpm to wash the spin column membrane. Discard the flow-through.

components.data: Add 500 μl Buffer RPE to the RNeasy spin column, and centrifuge for 15 sec at 10,000 rpm to wash the spin column membrane. Discard the flow-through. Repeat step.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 500 μl Buffer RPE to the RNeasy spin column, and centrifuge for 15 sec at 10,000 rpm to wash the spin column membrane. Discard the flow-through. Repeat step.

components.data: Add 500 μl Buffer RPE to the RNeasy spin column, and centrifuge for 2 min at 10,000 rpm to wash the spin column membrane. Discard the flow-through.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 500 μl Buffer RPE to the RNeasy spin column, and centrifuge for 2 min at 10,000 rpm to wash the spin column membrane. Discard the flow-through.

components.data: Air dry samples for 10 min, then place the RNeasy spin column in a new 2 ml collection tube, and centrifuge at full speed for 1 min.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Air dry samples for 10 min, then place the RNeasy spin column in a new 2 ml collection tube, and centrifuge at full speed for 1 min.

components.data: Place the RNeasy spin column in a new 1.5 ml collection tube (supplied). Add 50 μl RNase-free water directly to the spin column membrane. Incubate at RT for 2 minutes before centrifuging for 1 min at 10,000 rpm to elute the RNA. A second elution of 30 μl RNase-free water can be performed to ensure complete yield.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Place the RNeasy spin column in a new 1.5 ml collection tube (supplied). Add 50 μl RNase-free water directly to the spin column membrane. Incubate at RT for 2 minutes before centrifuging for 1 min at 10,000 rpm to elute the RNA. A second elution of 30 μl RNase-free water can be performed to ensure complete yield.

components.data: Quantify concentration by Qubit RNA BR.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Quantify concentration by Qubit RNA BR.
